channel.title: Running a Client
channel.description: OK everyone, I'm a total n oob when it comes to all of this private server stuff. I've seen on the server status page many servers need their own clients. The problem for me is, all the clients are .rar files. I have no idea how to run these and a little help would be appreciated. Thanks everyone who helps.

item.title: Running a Client
item.dc:creator: @T_A_G T A G
item.description:
@T_A_G wrote:

most comps got winrar already like Dells got them just double click than right click extract like he said and open new file.

Read full topic

item.title: Running a Client
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Download winrar, via google and then right click the file, and click on ‘extract here’.

Read full topic
